alert.note: Alert for Eastern Hillsborough; Interior Rockingham; Western And Central Hillsborough (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 5:48PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Hillsborough County through 615 PM EDT... At 547 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Nashua to near Brookline. Movement was north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Nashua, Merrimack, Milford, Amherst, Litchfield, Hollis, Brookline, Mason, Hudson, Pelham and Wilton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Hillsborough; Interior Rockingham; Western And Central Hillsborough
